name: .MAGIK File Extension
summary: Learn about .MAGIK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Programming file that contains source code written in the Magic programming language; developed by GE Energy (a division of General Electric) as part of the Smallworld technology platform.

content: The Magik programming language is used primarily for creating applications for enterprise utilities such as power distribution and telecommunications. It uses an object-oriented approach similar to Java and can be interpreted by the Magik virtual machine.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
